org.fridlund.javalabra.game.cameras

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fridlund.javalabra.game.cameras.Camera
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FirstPersonCamera

    public abstract class Camera
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract Camera class containing the methods to most likely be used when using a Camera. Has a position and a rotation (both in 3D).
